casebody.data:
Durham, Appellee, v. Gabriel et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Durham v. Gabriel (1970), 22 Ohio St. 2d 75.]

(No. 68-551 Decided April 22, 1970.) *76Mr. Fred Weisman and Mr. William H. Pearlman, for appellee. Messrs. Donaldson <& Golgrove and Mr. Richard 0. Golgrove, for appellants.

Chief Justice Taft participated in this case which was, however, decided after his death.

 Per Curiam.

The judgment of the Court of Appeals is affirmed on authority of Clouston v. Remlinger Oldsmobile Cadillac, Inc. (1970), 22 Ohio St. 2d 65.

Judgment affirmed.

O’Neill, C. J., Schneider, Herbert, Duncan and Corrigan, JJ., concur.* Matthias, J., not participating.
